name: Digital New Media Limited
overview:
Digital New Media are one of the UKâ€™s leading online media agencies.

Digital New Media was launched in 2009 by leading online marketing and retail expert Eddie Bent and brothers Joe and Thomas Newman.

A full service agency, Digital New Media offers a broad range of digital marketing solutions including e-commerce development, social media, email marketing, online PR and online marketing.

Digital New Media, a specialist digital marketing and e-commerce provider, have recently announced the launch of their performance based e-commerce solution; Liquid Commerce; which delivers proven e-commerce solutions on a revenue share basis.

Liquid Commerce has been developed to provide online retailers with a fully managed approach to e-commerce; which includes initial planning, design and website development combined with ongoing management and marketing to deliver increased sales for clients over an agreed period of time.

Liquid Commerce clients can benefit from a broad range of additional managed services; including search engine optimisation, online marketing, online PR, social media and email marketing which are implemented regularly to increase awareness and maximise sales revenues.
